Body:
x = hl.Var('x')
f = hl.Func('f')
f[x] = x * hl.f64(c) * (hl.f64(0.1) + hl.f64(0.2))
for i, hl_value in enumerate(numpy.asarray(f.realize(10))):
    py_value = i * c * (0.1 + 0.2)
    check = math.isclose(hl_value, py_value)
    assert check, '{}[{}]: {} != {}'.format(i, c, hl_value, py_value)
